main event: The report describes the sighting of an unidentified flying object (UFO) over Artesia, New Mexico on November 6, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as oblong in shape, the size of a 25-cent piece, and red in color with a tail of fire like a meteor.
The object passed by all at once and was observed for only 10 seconds.
The sighting was classified as a meteor by the investigators.
There were numerous other UFO sightings reported in the area during the 72-hour period prior to this incident.
The investigators suggested the sighting could have been a reflection of the setting sun on the body of a jet aircraft, with the jet exhaust explaining the meteor-like tail.
sighted object: Oblong, red object with a tail of fire
photographs: No photographs were included in the report
